name: SSRB adventure
description:
During the landing on the battlefield, the SSRB and Botan are separated. Now, SSRB needs to find Botan and help her!

This is a story about an ordinary day of SSRB's life.

The game is absolutely free. 5 levels. 2-3 hours is the average amount of time it takes to finish this game.

https://itch.io/t/2745236/ssrb-adventure
